import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import AddFavouritesStar from '../components/AddFavouritesStar'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import useFetch from '../useFetch'; const SingleBeerScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [querySingleBeer, setQuerySigleBeer] = useState(); const { isLoading, data, isError } = useFetch(`${querySingleBeer}`); useEffect(() => { setQuerySigleBeer(`/${id}`) }, []) return ( <> {isLoading &&
LOADING
} {isError &&
ERROR
}

{data[0]?.name}

{data[0]?.tagline}

{data[0]?.description}
ABV: {data[0]?.abv}%
IBU: {data[0]?.ibu}
SRM: {data[0]?.srm}
EBC: {data[0]?.ebc}
PH: {data[0]?.ph}

Food pairing

{data[0]?.food_pairing[0]}
{data[0]?.food_pairing[1]}
{data[0]?.food_pairing[2]}
) } export default SingleBeerScreen;
